problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the midpoint of BC, and AE and BD intersect at point F. If the area of ​​△BFE is N_0, then the area of ​​△ABF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD为平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC,∴△AFD∽△EFB,∴\frac{AF}{EF}=\frac{AD}{BE},而E为BC的中点,∴BE=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}AD,∴\frac{AF}{EF}=2,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupBAF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupBEF}}=\frac{AF}{EF}=2,∴S~△ABF~=2S~△BFE~=6．故选:B．
